entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
